TextLibrary.Text: Syrus Darkhunter
Darkhunter does 10 points of damage to any Undead creature at the start of a battle.
Undead are my specialty. I will fill it with arrows before it even reaches you.
Farewell then, friend. I shall be near Gallia in the Borderlands if you need my help.
Half-Elf
Male

Syrus Darkhunter is a mysterious warrior from the Borderlands. Relatively young, he has earned a fearsome reputation as a hunter of Undead creatures. He is silent and thoughtful, and does not like to discuss his past.
Drong
Drong does 10 points of damage to any Animal at the start of a battle.
Yum yum yum. Drong going to take a bite of this creature.
Bye bye! Drong wait for you in his Tower if you need him again.
Ogre
Male

Drong is a massively fat Ogre with a remarkably friendly nature, who never seems to stop eating. It is entirely possible that there is nothing in the Realms of Etheria that Drong will not try to devour, given half a chance.
Elistara
Elistara adds +10% Water Resistance against Large opponents.
Stand back! I am trained to fight large creatures. My shield will protect you.
If you are certain that you do not need me for now, I will await your return in Ylarie.
High Elf
Female
Elistara is a High Elven Dragonknight. Like all of her people she is serious and efficient - a loyal companion, but a dangerous enemy.
Flicker
Flicker adds +10 to your Air Resistance when fighting Fliers.
This creature can fly. I'll help keep it off of you!
I will be back in the Dragonrealm if you need me.
Dragon
Male

Flicker is a young Gold Dragon, whose parents have gone missing, along with all the other Dragons in the Dragon Realm. Flicker is quick-witted and often rude, but has joined the party to help locate his family and friends.
Khalkus
Khalkus adds +10 to your Battle when fighting against Citadels or Mechanical foes.
Oh aye, I know how to fix this. I can help ye fight this one.
Farewell. If ye want me, I'll be back in the Hammer Pass waitin' for ye.
Dwarf
Male
Khalkus is a Dwarven Engineer from the mines of Khaz-Agar. He is fascinated by all things mechanical, and often talks at great length about his current projects and future plans.
Patch
Patch has a 20% chance to backstab an opponent for 25 points of damage.
Surprise!!! Say hello to my little friend...
You... you don't want me? If you change your mind I will wait for you in Hyaan.
Gnoll
Male
Patch is a crazed and psychotic Gnoll Thief. Despite being a little unstable, he is fiercely loyal to those he knows and trusts, perhaps even a little overprotective of them.
Princess Serephine
Serephine adds +10 to your Battle when fighting Good opponents.
Allow me to charm your opponent. They will not strike a lady.
You have been kind to me and I am willing to travel further. I will wait for you in Bartonia.
Human
Female

Serephine is the daughter of the Selentine Emperor, whom you rescued from an arranged marriage to the Barbarian Lord, Trarg. Serephine is beautiful and charming, and always manages to get her own way.
Sunspear
Sunspear adds +10 to Red Mana when fighting Minotaurs.
Fire is your greatest ally when fighting a Minotaur!
Farewell, young warrior, I shall wait for you at the Horned Temple.
Minotaur
Male

Sunspear is an old and wise Minotaur Firewalker, assigned to you by his leader, Tauron Flamebite. Although he is not the warrior he once was, Sunspear is wise and knowledgeable in the ways of the Realms of War.
Sunspear's Spirit
Sunspear's Spirit adds +10 to Red Mana when fighting Undead or Minotaurs.
I have seen into the realm beyond. Let me aid you against this foe.
Farewell, young warrior, My spirit will wait for you at the Horned Temple.
Minotaur Spirit
Male
Sunspear was an old and wise Minotaur Firewalker. He achieved great honor being slain in battle against Ragnar and his spirit has now returned to aid you.
Winter
Winter halves the starting mana of any opponent whose Fire Mastery is 15 or higher.
This creature is born of fire. My icy breath will drain their mana!
I will return to my pack. If you need me, I can be found near Tirianin.
Wolf
Male
Winter Wolves are a rare breed of Wolf found only in the Northern Tundra. They are almost always pack leaders and masters of the hunt. Their icy breath can slow an enemy in its tracks.
